CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Salutation , "Herr"),"Sehr geehrter Herr"&" " & LastName , (IF( ISPICKVAL( Salutation , "Frau"),"Sehr geehrte Frau"&" " & LastName ,(IF( ISPICKVAL( Salutation , "Herr Prof."),"Sehr geehrter Herr Prof."&" " & LastName , (IF( ISPICKVAL( Salutation , "Frau Prof."),"Sehr geehrte Frau Prof."&" " & LastName , (IF( ISPICKVAL( Salutation , "Herr Dr."),"Sehr geehrter Herr Dr."&" " & LastName , (IF( ISPICKVAL( Salutation , "Frau Dr."),"Sehr geehrte Frau Dr."&" " & LastName , (IF( ISPICKVAL( Salutation , "Dear"),"Dear"&" " & FirstName &" " & LastName&"," , (IF( ISPICKVAL( Salutation , "Mr."),"Dear Mr."&" " &LastName&"," , (IF( ISPICKVAL( Salutation , "Mrs."),"Dear Mrs."&" " &LastName&"," , (IF( ISPICKVAL( Salutation , "Ms."),"Dear Ms."&" " &LastName&"," , "Dear"&" " & FirstName &" " & LastName&",")))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Letter Salutation
